info.title: API V1
info.description: The Dog Facts API allows users to access a collection of dog facts that have been submitted by members of the public. The API is simple to use and provides a variety of options for retrieving dog facts. With the V1 version of the API, users can access dog facts in a variety of formats, including plain text and HTML.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Number of facts to return (max 5, defaults to 1)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of facts to return (max 5, defaults to 1) - alias for 'number'

parameters.name: raw
parameters.description: Return plain text instead of JSON

facts: Two Labradors, Lucky and Flo, were the first dogs known for sniffing out pirated DVDs.
